transferFromWithFeeAtVault(address,addre.details: Deducts a fee from the amount and transfers the net amount to the recipient and fee to the treasury.

params.amount: The total amount to transfer before fees.
params.maxFeeRateScale: The scaling factor for the fee rate.
params.token: The address of the token (ERC20) or zero address for Ether.
params.treasury: The address of the treasury to receive the fee.

transferFromWithFeeAtVault(address,addre.notice: Transfers tokens from one address to another with a fee deducted, sending the fee to the treasury.
